trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Monterey
There were no other sightings in Monterey on or around December 9th 2012
Summary: Glowing Blue softball sized UFO seen for seconds. Stationary for split second then Increadable speed and disappeared.
divs: sighting detailsdriving home, on highway one in monterey\seaside area caught a glimps of something appear in periferal vision. thought is was a plane or shooting star at first but like no plane or shooting star i've ever seen. it appeared to be a glowing blue softball to base ball sized sperical ufo seen only for 3 seconds. stationary for split second then increadable speed and disappeared. when moving appeared to be blury and leave trail like a comet which perhaps it was for a split second. at first wondered what it could be, comet, maybe. definalty not a shooting sta or plane though.
